item.title: Report of the Attorney General's Cyber Digital Task Force
item.description: Published: July 2018 Tags: 2010s Department of Justice Going Dark Law Enforcement Abstract: In February of 2018, the Attorney General established a Cyber-Digital Task force within the U.S. Department of Justice and tasked it with answer two foundational questions. First, “how is the Department responding to cyber threats?” Second, “how can federal law enforcement more effectively accomplish its mission in this important and rapidly evolving area?” This Report addresses the first question.
